EmailTemplate.description: Application received, attached Fleet Data Form
EmailTemplate.name: Sunoco App Received
EmailTemplate.subject: Action Required | Your Application Is Being Processed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Application_Signer_First_Name__c},
Thank you for returning your application. We will respond to your request within 5 days.
Attached is a form to list your vehicle and driver information necessary to set up your account. If you have already submitted this information, please disregard this message.
Driver Information:
Please provide a list of your driver names with four or six-digit driver ID numbers. If you prefer to have us assign your driver ID numbers, simply leave that field blank. Your driver will be required to enter this number when they fuel the vehicles. This feature lets you easily view who made the transaction.
Vehicle Information:
At least one column must be completed for the tracking reports to be established. Remaining columns are optional and can remain blank. Please select one field that you would like to see appear on the second line of your card, beneath your company name.
This field of information is meant to be a means of identification so you will know which vehicle is being fueled.
Please email or fax the form back to me at {!Opportunity.Opportunity_Owner_Fax__c} at your earliest convenience.
As soon as your account is approved, an Account Setup Specialist will call you to cover the set-up details with you before ordering your cards.
Sincerely,
{!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName} {!Opportunity.OwnerLastName}
{!Opportunity.OwnerTitle}
Phone - {!Opportunity.OwnerPhone}
Fax - {!Opportunity.Opportunity_Owner_Fax__c}
{!Opportunity.OwnerEmail}
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: "This message contains confidential information of WEX, Inc. It is intended only for the use of the designated recipient(s) stated above and further distribution of the information is prohibited. If you have received this message in error, please notify sender immediately by telephone or reply by e-mail and delete the entire message and any attachments."
Sunoco Fleet Card Services, 97 Darling Avenue, South Portland, ME 04106
